âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Zero-dependency and zero-config for multiple OS â€¢ Low-latency streaming â€¢ Support for various streaming protocols (RTSP, RTMP, HTTP-FLV, WebRTC, MSE, HLS, MP4, MJPEG, HomeKit) â€¢ FFmpeg integration for broader source support and transcoding
ðŸ“– Summary: go2rtc is a versatile camera streaming application written in Go, supporting a wide array of protocols including RTSP, RTMP, WebRTC, and HomeKit. It enables users to stream from various sources, transcode on-the-fly, and publish to popular streaming services, making it suitable for smart home integration and standalone use.
